I'm not sure if this is related to the fluctuating orbits thing or just KER, but when I was looking at the readouts for my orbit, I got this:

If you can't see it, the Apoapsis value is below the Periapsis value. I'm not sure why this is, but if anyone else knows please tell me.
Unless I've missed something, 24542 is greater than 23732, isn't it ?

No it isn't:

Apoapsis: 24,542.6 meters
Periapsis: 23,732.0 meters

The time is less because you're past apoapsis and descending towards periapsis, i.e. you get to your next periapsis before your next apoapsis. That's all.

Edited May 27, 2016 by The_Rocketeer
Thanks, sorry, didn't realise that. Can a moderator close this thread, please?
